bot.name: Cognitum
bot.description:
This is a small Discord bot with statistics collection and useful utility features made by The Core Community.

Current prefix: `%prefix%`

example.list: `doc list` — Open list of the documents;
example.create: `doc create games-list` — Create new document with code «games-list»;
example.rename: `doc rename top-users Top server users` — Rename document «top-users» to «Top server users»;
example.image: `doc image picture https://example.org/image.png` — Attach image to «picture» document;

help.title: Help
help.description: Lists all available commands and usage examples for them.

lang.title: Localization
lang.changedDescription: Successfully changed language to %languageName% for current guild!

log.title: Logs settings

example.enableFeature: `log enable rename` — Enable nickname changes logging;
example.disableFeature: `log disable msg_delete` — Disable message deleting logging;
example.enableAll: `log enable all` — Enable all logging features.

public.set: Public logs channel successfully set to <#%channelId%>!

private.set: Private logs channel successfully set to <#%channelId%>!

on.title: Logging enabled
on.description: Logging feature successfully enabled! If logging still not working then check for bot permissions or channels availability.

merge.title: Merge voice channel
merge.description: Move members from voice channel you're connected to, to another one. This command can be casted only if caller and bot have Move Members permission.
merge.move: `merge 415190108577464333` — Move all members from your current voice channel to channel with following ID.

prefix.title: Change prefix
prefix.description: Command for setting up custom prefix.

changed.title: Prefix changed!
changed.description: Prefix for current guild successfully changed to `%prefix%`!
changed.descriptionDefault: Prefix for current guild successfully reset to default. Now it's `%prefix%`.

prefix.exampleReset: `prefix` — Reset prefix to default global prefix;

profile.title: Member profile
profile.description: Shows information about current member from Discord and internal bot database.

example.selected: `profile @Helif` — Show profile of the user by mention.

remind.title: Reminder
remind.description:
Command for making reminder for yourself in some time.
**Time string format:** `<days>`d`<hours>`h`<minutes>`m`<seconds>`s
**Maximal time:** 29 days 23 hours 59 minutes 59 seconds

example.message: `remind Check for my mail 4h30m` — Remind `Check for my mail` in 4 hours and 30 minutes.

top.title: Guild Statistics

example.channels: `top channels` — Show first page of the top channels activity;
example.voiceShort: `top v` — Show first page of the top voice activity;
example.usersPaged: `top users 3` — Show third page of the top members activity.

welcome.title: Welcome feature managing
welcome.description: Command for managing settings for welcome feature. Only admins can change settings.

on.title: Welcome feature enabled
on.description: Welcome feature has been enabled! Check if manager and verified roles is set up correctly and welcome channel is set too.

off.title: Welcome feature disabled
off.description: Welcome feature disabled. Roles and channel setting will stay, but commands for welcome managers will not work.

managerUpdated.title: Welcome feature: Manager role changed
managerUpdated.description: Manager role successfully changed to <@!%roleID%>. Members marked by this role will be allow now to verify newcomers.

botPermissionError.title: Missing permissions!
botPermissionError.description: Bot missing one of the following permissions: %permissionsList%. Contact your guild administrators to fix it.

callerPermissionError.title: Access denied!
callerPermissionError.description: You don't have required permissions to call this command! List of required permissions: %permissionsList%.

commandNotFound.title: Command `%commandName%` not found!
commandNotFound.description: Requested command not found! Try to enter `%prefix%help` to get a complete list of commands.

default.title: An error has occurred!
default.description:
An unexpected error has occurred! Try again later or notify us about this problem at [our Discord guild](https://discord.gg/SbNZQMV) or [GitHub repository](https://github.com/thecorecity/cognitum/issues/new).
__Details:__ %errorMessage%

usage.title: Documents: Wrong command usage!
usage.description: Incorrect command usage! Check help page for this command using `help doc` command.

missing.title: Documents: Document missing!
missing.description: Document you're looking for missing in database! You need to create it first by command `doc create <slug>`!

exist.title: Documents: This slug already used!
exist.description: Following document slug already used in this guild! In order to perform this action you need this document slug to be free.

canceled.title: Documents: Action canceled by user!
canceled.description: Document content fetching has been canceled by user.

timeout.title: Documents: Timed out!
timeout.description: Document content fetching has been canceled due to timeout. Note that you have only 60 seconds to send required document content.

invalidArgumentError.title: Invalid arguments error
invalidArgumentError.description:
Arguments passed to this command is invalid!
__Details:__ %details%
invalidArgumentError.min: This command requires at least %minValue% argument(s)!
invalidArgumentError.max: This command requires less or equal %maxValue% argument(s)!
invalidArgumentError.valueList: Argument accepts values %argumentExpectedList%, but `%argumentPassed%` argument passed.

timeString.title: Incorrect time string passed!
timeString.description:
Time string passed to the argument is invalid!
__Details:__ %details%

details.wrongParams: One of the time string segments have invalid amount of time!
details.zeroTime: Time string must contain non-zero amount of time!
